sentences.en: All sorts of colours will result as these flowers hybridise freely.
sentences.cn: 这些花自由杂交后会产生各种各样的颜色。

sentences.en: Danny shared his knowledge freely with anyone interested.
sentences.cn: 丹尼十分乐意地和所有感兴趣的人分享他的知识。

sentences.en: EU members are allowed to travel freely between member states.
sentences.cn: 欧盟成员国国民可以在成员国之间自由旅行。

sentences.en: Merchandise can now circulate freely among the EU countries.
sentences.cn: 商品现在可以在欧盟各国自由流通。

sentences.en: She was unable to keep back her tears, and wept freely.
sentences.cn: 她抑制不住泪水, 痛痛快快地哭了起来.

sentences.en: She wondered whether he had someone to whom he could talk freely.
sentences.cn: 她不知道他是否有可以倾心交谈的对象。

sentences.en: The clay court was slippery and he was unable to move freely.
sentences.cn: 红土网球场很滑，他不能自如地移动。

sentences.en: The condition prevents the blood from circulating freely.
sentences.cn: 这种病阻碍了血液的循环畅通。

sentences.en: the country’s first freely elected president
sentences.cn: 该国首位自由选举产生的总统

sentences.en: The men talk as cheerfully as ever; jests are bandied about freely.
sentences.cn: 男人们像往常一样高兴地聊着，彼此间随意开着玩笑。

sentences.en: The sheep are allowed to roam freely on this land.
sentences.cn: 绵羊可以在这片地上自由走动。

sentences.en: The soil drains freely and slugs aren't a problem.
sentences.cn: 土壤排水畅通，鼻涕虫就不会造成什么麻烦。

sentences.en: They freely admitted using the drug.
They used these words freely, often in front of their parents too.
sentences.cn: 这些语词他们随口即出，在父母面前也常常如此。

sentences.en: We have referred freely to his ideas.
sentences.cn: 我们频繁地提到了他的观点。

sentences.en: Williams freely admits he lives for racing.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯坦承他为赛车而活。

sentences.en: You must allow the clubhead to swing freely.
sentences.cn: 必须让杆头一气呵成地挥出。

words.tran_cn: 免费的；自由的，不受约束的；[化学] 游离的
自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权
自由民；享有市民权的人；荣誉市民
使自由；解放（free的过去分词）
自由地；免费地；大量地；慷慨地；直率地

trans.tran_cn: 自由地，自愿地，直率地，慷慨地
trans.tran_en: without anyone stopping or limiting something
